title: SPC-001-FR
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:spc]]

[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

[[=]]
++ THE FOLLOWING FILES HAVE BEEN CLASSIFIED

+ ##blue|[[size 200%]]WAY GNARLY[[/size]]##

++ BY ORDER OF THE HIGH PUGILORD
[[/=]]
-----
[[div class="content-panel standalone series"]]
[[==]]
**GENERAL NOTICE 001-Àlpha:** In order to keep knowledge of SPC-001-FR from selachian sympathizers, several/no false SPC-001-FR files have been created alongside the true file/files. All files concerning the nature of SPC-001-FR, including the decoy/decoys, are protected by a squaloidhazardous murderdoodle designed to cause immediate facial pummeling in any unpatriotic wimpoids attempting to put their scrawny little mitts on our super secret stuff. Revealing the true nature/natures of SPC-001-FR to the general public is cause for execution, humiliation, defenestration, and whatever the hell else we feel like at the time.
[[/==]]
[[/div]]
-----
[[=]]
+ ##blue|[[size 200%]]WARNING:[[/size]]##

ANY UN-BODACIOUS DUDES OR DUDETTES ACCESSING THIS FILE WILL BE IMMEDIATELY WIPED OUT THROUGH USE OF THE **KELLY-ROCKHOPPER** MURDERDOODLE. SCROLLING DOWN WITHOUT PUGILISTIC FORTITUDE WILL RESULT IN IMMEDIATE CRUISING FOLLOWED BY A BRUISING.

+ ##blue|YOU HAVE BEEN WARNED##
[[/=]]
-----

[[=image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/spc-001-fr/Loro_Parque_Koi3.jpg style="width: 85%; border: solid 1px #000000; padding: 1px"]]
[[=]]
**MURDERDOODLE ENGAGED**

**CONTINUED RADICALITY DETECTED**

**POWERING DOWN SAFETY FISTICUFFS**

//Welcome, most tubular one. Please select your desired file.//
[[/=]]
-----
[[div class="content-panel standalone series" style="max-width: 707px"]]

[[=]]
[[[proposition-du-dr-maquereau|CODE NAME: Dr. Maquereau]]] - Sharkachon

--CODE NAME: Dr. Grym - The Big Island--

--CODE NAME: Dr. Johannes - Too many grams of Xibalbar--

--CODE NAME: Dr. Gray - Not all Gangs have diesel--

--CODE NAME: Drs. Gémini and Tesla - The Beach of Old Sharkozistes--

--CODE NAME: Prof. Finalis - Selechian Capacity to be Pugilized--

--CODE NAME: Henry Von Kartoffen - Ille sous la Vilaine--[[footnote]]**Translator's Note:** This literally means "Ille under the Vilaine" and is a play on the French department Ille-et-Vilaine, which literally means Ille-and-Vilaine.[[/footnote]]

--CODE NAME: Prof. F██████ - There will be no Bath--

--CODE NAME: ██-██  - GLAGLA (cold water)--

--CODE NAME:  Dr. Macro - I am dab--[[footnote]]**Translator's Note:** The original text was "Je suis morue", which translates to "I am cod". However, to better fit with the original joke, "morue" sounding similar to "mort", I instead translated it as "dab", which is a fish that sounds similar to "dead", the English translation of "mort".[[/footnote]]
[[size 80%]]A colleague of yours, [[[SCP-504-FR|Dr. Maquereau]]]?[[/size]]

[[/=]]
[[/div]]
